skill.name: claude-opus-4-5-migration
skill.description: Migrate prompts and code from Claude Sonnet 4.0, Sonnet 4.5, or Opus 4.1 to Opus 4.5. Use when the user wants to update their codebase, prompts, or API calls to use Opus 4.5. Handles model string updates and prompt adjustments for known Opus 4.5 behavioral differences. Does NOT migrate Haiku 4.5.

content.user_title: Migrate Claude prompts and code to Opus 4.5
content.value_statement: Your code still targets older Claude models and may miss Opus 4.5 behavior changes. This skill updates model strings and applies optional prompt fixes.
actual_capabilities: Replace model strings for Anthropic API, AWS Bedrock, Google Vertex AI, and Azure AI Foundry
Remove the unsupported context-1m-2025-08-07 beta header
Add effort set to high with the effort-2025-11-24 beta flag
Apply prompt softening for tool overtriggering when requested
Add prompt snippets for over-engineering, code exploration, frontend design, or thinking sensitivity when requested
limitations: Does not migrate any Haiku models
Prompt adjustments are only applied when the user requests them or reports issues
Requires you to identify the platform to choose the correct model string
Effort configuration depends on beta support in the API or SDK

use_cases.title: Update model strings
use_cases.description: Replace old model identifiers across services and keep API calls current.

use_cases.title: Tune prompt behavior
use_cases.description: Apply targeted prompt fixes only when Opus 4.5 behavior changes appear.

use_cases.title: Align multi-cloud usage
use_cases.description: Match Opus 4.5 model strings across Bedrock, Vertex AI, and Azure AI Foundry.

prompt_templates.title: Quick model update
prompt_templates.scenario: Simple migration with no prompt edits
prompt_templates.prompt: Update all Claude model strings in my codebase from Sonnet 4.5 to Opus 4.5. Do not change prompts.

prompt_templates.title: Add effort parameter
prompt_templates.scenario: Enable high effort with beta flag
prompt_templates.prompt: Migrate to Opus 4.5 and add effort set to high in all API calls. Include the required beta flag.

prompt_templates.title: Fix tool overtriggering
prompt_templates.prompt: Migrate to Opus 4.5 and soften any tool triggering language that causes overuse. Keep other instructions unchanged.

prompt_templates.title: Full targeted migration
prompt_templates.prompt: Migrate to Opus 4.5, remove unsupported beta headers, and add the code exploration snippet if my prompts are too speculative.

output_examples.input: Migrate our Bedrock and Vertex AI model strings to Opus 4.5 and remove unsupported beta headers.
output: Replaced Bedrock and Vertex AI model identifiers with Opus 4.5 equivalents
Removed the context-1m-2025-08-07 beta header and noted the limitation
Summarized all model string updates for review

best_practices: Update only the model strings unless the user reports a prompt issue
Match prompt snippet style and structure to the existing system prompt
Summarize all edits and remind the user to report Opus 4.5 issues
anti_patterns: Applying prompt snippets without a user request or reported issue
Adding beta headers that are unsupported by Opus 4.5

faq.question: Is this compatible with Sonnet 4.0, Sonnet 4.5, and Opus 4.1?
faq.answer: Yes, it targets those source models and maps them to Opus 4.5 strings.

faq.question: What models are not supported by this migration?
faq.answer: Haiku models are excluded and should not be migrated by this skill.

faq.question: How does it integrate with my API calls?
faq.answer: It updates model strings and can add the effort beta flag and output_config.

faq.question: Does it send data outside my environment?
faq.answer: No, it only guides edits to your local prompts and code.

faq.question: What if tools are called too often after migration?
faq.answer: Apply the tool overtriggering fix to soften aggressive instructions.

faq.question: How does this compare to a manual update?
faq.answer: It provides verified model strings and optional fixes for known Opus 4.5 behaviors.
